## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G06130](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G06130)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtHMP25</u>
- **Gene Name:** HEAVY METAL ASSOCIATED PROTEIN 25
- **Description:**   Heavy metal transport/detoxification superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2082425
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
